thread.title: Sales Consultants

title: Sales Consultants
text:
Region : Gauteng / Johannesburg / Boksburg Company : Lavender Health 
COMPANY REQUIRES MOTIVATED INDIVIDUALS TO JOIN THEIR DYNAMIC TEAM. East Rand. R9500 Basic Salary. Bonuses + above average commission. Full company training provided. No Experience Needed. REQUIREMENTS: OWN VEHICLE and drivers license is a MUST! Good people skills and presentable! Have to stay in GAUTENG or close to the EAST RAND! For an interview call 011 869 6345 which will give you the fastest result or sms name and contact number to 0725986489 and we will call you back.
